Class player

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
player
public class player extends greenfoot.Actor
A player which can move, kill enemies and also take damage. It can also pick up items.
Version:
02/12/2023
Author:
Matteo Guarnaccia, William Brown, Yufan Kambang
